mapper.select: SELECT role.role_code FROM system_user user LEFT JOIN system_user_role user_role ON user_role.user_uuid = user.uuid LEFT JOIN system_role role ON role.uuid = user_role.role_uuid WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY id ASC

SELECT permission.permission_code FROM system_user user LEFT JOIN system_user_role user_role ON user_role.user_uuid = user.uuid LEFT JOIN system_role role ON role.uuid = user_role.role_uuid LEFT JOIN system_role_permission role_permission ON role_permission.role_uuid = role.uuid LEFT JOIN system_permission permission ON role_permission.permission_uuid = permission.uuid WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND permission_state = 1 ORDER BY permission_code,permission_order ASC
